content.prompt_es: Selecciona la traducción para 'Atención al cliente':

content.stimulus_en: We (not/have) ________ any more in stock.
I (look) ________ for the fitting rooms.
They (be) ________ on sale today.
Can I (get) ________ a refund?
How much (be) ________ this shirt?
She (buy) ________ a new dress yesterday.
The queue at the cashier was very long.
Where the is customer service desk?
Can I have a receipt, please?
This is brand very expensive but high quality.
I found a real bargain in the sales.
The store department has ten floors.
I know the word for Ganga is '________'.
Discount
I know the word for Reembolso is '________'.
Fitting room
